entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 2 except minus 8 in a few localities.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2 except minus 8 in a few localities. Wind chill minus 14 this morning and minus 6 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 07 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness overnight. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 26 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 07 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 07 January 2023
